盜.definition: to steal; to rob; to plunder; thief; bandit; robber

盜刷.definition: to fraudulently draw on (sb's credit card account)

盜取.definition: to steal (including identity theft, credit card fraud or theft of computer account); to misappropriate

盜圖.definition: to use an image without permission

盜壘.definition: (baseball) to steal a base; stolen base (SB)

盜採.definition: to mine (or harvest, log, trap animals etc) illegally; illegal mining (or logging etc)

盜版.definition: pirated; illegal; see also 正版[zheng4 ban3]

盜版黨.definition: Pirate Party, political movement whose main goal is to reform copyright law in line with the Internet era

盜用.definition: to use illegitimately; to misappropriate; to embezzle

盜賣.definition: to steal sth and sell it

盜錄.definition: to pirate (an audio recording, movie etc); to bootleg
